definition[0]: the part of something that is at the front of it when it moves
definition[1]: the part of an activity where the most modern and advanced equipment and methods are used
example[0]: This is the leading edge of medical technology.
definition[2]: leading-edge machines, systems etc are the most modern and advanced ones available
example[1]: leading-edge technologies for military and computer applications
definition[3]: the area of activity where the most modern and advanced equipment and methods are used
example[2]: Software companies are on the leading edge of technology in very competitive markets.
